messages.title: Stephen's Key Pledges
messages.content: Stephen is proud of the NHS and will continue working hard to protect and improve our local health services. Anti-social behaviour, burglary and petty crime affect us all and Stephen is leading the fight back to reclaim our local communities. Stephen is committed to driving forward the regeneration of Stevenage town centre.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Protection and improvement of NHS local health services.
Tackling anti-social behaviour, burglary, and petty crime to reclaim local communities.
Committed to driving forward the regeneration of Stevenage town centre.

issues.economy: Stephen is working hard to improve local public services, to stop the jobs, in Codicote, to grow by over two thirds if the local infrastructure plan, Gresley Park, goes ahead.
issues.environment: Stephen has submitted several projects to deliver the renewal of play facilities and future green spaces and projects that can help communities will be an intrinsic part of the future of the town and the local government.
issues.governance: It is time to give power back to local people. Stephen says, 'We need to stop this, we need to give power back to local people.'
issues.health: Stephen is proud of the NHS and will continue working hard to protect and improve our local health services.

housing.content: Stephen has submitted several projects to deliver the renewal of play facilities and future green spaces and projects that can help communities will be an intrinsic part of the future of the town and the local government.

contactInformation.address: Unit 15, Gunnels Wood Park, Gunnels Wood Road, Stevenage SG1 2BH

images.caption: IT IS TIME TO GIVE POWER BACK TO LOCAL PEOPLE
LEARNING ABOUT THE PROJECT TO REBUILD THE JOHN CLEMENTS SPORTS AND COMMUNITY CENTRES.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Stephen is pictured backing the 'bag levy' campaign and supporting young employees at a local company.
